recipesJson.name: Amethyst Sour
recipesJson.author: Gabe8986
recipesJson.description:
So I love grape style vapes but they are almost always too sickly for me so this is a sour grape and mixed berry candy vape that has nice flavor punch w a sour finish that does not get sickly. If you want more grape flavor just turn up the tfa grape juice a bit and sweeten to taste. Less sour just lower or emit flv candy roll and/or flv lemon. This is a shake and vape but a couple days and everything really comes together.
01/17/20 So i bumped grape juice  from 3.5-4% and I am liking it a bit more..It's more grape tasting without loosing the tangyness.
01/26/20..I added la lemonade 1% which adds a juicy tangier aspect to it.
